title: KHM Travel Group Launches New Travel Agent Meeting Website
text:
KHM Travel Group Launches New Travel Agent Meeting Website
Host travel agency redesigns website to provide easy access to information about upcoming training events and FAM trips.
Brunswick, OH, August 28, 2015 --( PR.com )-- KHM Travel Group offers its independent agents a variety of live training opportunities and thanks to the newly redesigned TravelAgentMeeting.com website, these events are now more accessible than ever.
The latest restructuring of the site breaks down each category of training event including Boot Camp, Destination Success, Regional Trainings, Industry Trainings, and FAM Trips.
Along with speaker information and training schedules, online registration is available for Boot Camp and Destination Success â€“ the two events which are held in-house at KHM Travel Group's Corporate Office. Agents looking to register for these multi-day events can also find information about shuttle services and the exclusive discounted group rate for accommodations.
An impressive feature of the new website is the extensive catalog of FAM trips and Seminars at Sea. Agents can easily scroll through the list of upcoming FAM trips and view more details about each including dates, prices, and registration qualifications. Photos and overviews of past FAMs provide a great snapshot as to what one can expect from a supplier-hosted trip.
"The new Travel Agent Meeting was developed specifically with our travel agents in mind. We streamlined the event registration process for them, and made it very mobile-friendly for phone and tablet users," said Digital Marketing Director Jason Zimmerman.
The innovative layout and content of www.travelagentmeeting.com is just one of the many steps KHM Travel Group has taken to use technology to help its travel agents grow their businesses.
For more information about KHM Travel Group, visit www.khmtravel.com.
About KHM Travel Group - KHM Travel Group is one of the nation's fastest-growing host travel agencies, currently supporting 3,600+ independent home-based travel agents across the United States. With an innovative training and support program, along with a dedicated staff of over 50 full-time employees, KHM Travel Group specializes in helping individuals sell travel products including cruises, vacation packages, tours, honeymoons, group travel and more. For more information, visit www.khmtravel.com.
